title: Neptune's Ring
description: In the sequel to Venus Rising, drama thrives as Levi moves to a private island to oversee the development of the new resort and unravels clues to the mysterious disappearance of the woman who is reported to haunt the island. Levi finds herself hopelessly in love with Vanessa, while Simone tries every devious trick in the book to win Levi back. Wedding bells ring, but for whom will they toll?Words: 97,865 (approximate)
author: Ali Spooner
